item.title: Concurrency vs Parallelism
item.description: Recently, I have been experimenting with web scraping a lot, and after one too many session of just sitting around waiting for my requests to finish, I finally decided to see if there exists a better way. After some initial Googling I found out about two techniques known as parallelism and concurrency, and thus began my journey into learning about these two for the next few months. During that time, I noticed that several people, me included, were confused on what the difference between these two?
